attributes.action: Make Ball Games in the road or public paths illegal & inforce with on the spot fines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ball games in the street make thousand upon thousands of peoples lives a misery with the constant thud of the ball & property damaged by the ball hitting cars, fences & peoples houses. It should be illegal to play with a ball on public paths & the road as this is also dangerous, the Police should be able to give on the spot fines of £50. The first government to make the banning of ball games on public roads & paths illegal will have my vote.
